StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetComponentCodeHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @leadID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT lhli.OldValue, lhli.NewValue, lh.ChangeDate FROM [dbo].[LeadHistoryLineItem] lhli INNER JOIN [dbo].[LeadHistory] lh ON lhli.LeadHistoryID = lh.LeadHistoryID WHERE lhli.ChangedField = 'ComponentCode' and LeadID = @leadID ORDER BY lh.ChangeDate Desc
